api.warn.unknown-class-prop.en-us: WARNING: "%s" doesn't have any known properties, Please submit an issue at https://github.com/hexa0/lighting-profile/issues/new or update the API if it's outdated

api.warn.duplicated-name.en-us: WARNING: "ORIGINAL_NAME" doesn't have a unique name, automatically renamed to "UNIQUE_NAME"

api.warn.deprecated.en-us: WARNING: LightingProfileHandler:%s(%s) is deprecated, use LightingProfileHandler:%s(%s) instead.

plugin.warn.no-selection.en-us: WARNING: You must select a lighting profile

plugin.button.create-profile.description.en-us: Creates a new lighting profile from the current lighting

plugin.button.apply-profile.description.en-us: Applies the currently selected lighting profile

plugin.button.get-api.description.en-us: Gives you the API required to use this plugin in your code
